alert.note: Alert for Clarendon; Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 26 at 8:19PM EDT until August 26 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Clarendon County in central South Carolina... Southeastern Orangeburg County in central South Carolina... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 819 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Santee State Park to near Eastern Lake Marion, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Holly Hill, Santee, Eutawville, Vance, Eautaw Springs, Indian Bluff Recreation Park, Rocks Pond Campground and Marina, Blounts Landing, and Mill Creek Marina and Campground. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 between mile markers 165 and 169. Interstate 95 between mile markers 86 and 102. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Severe thunderstorms can produce large capsizing waves and frequent lightning. If on or near Lake Marion move away from the water and take shelter!
